name: @fso/bootstrap
description: A Bootstrap theme utilizing University of Arizona branding

scripts.dist: npm run css:all && npm run fa-icons:all && npm run ua-icons:all
scripts.css:all: npm run css:compile && npm run css:prefix && npm run css:minify
scripts.css:compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/fso-bootstrap.scss dist/bootstrap.css
scripts.fa-icons:all: npm run fa-icons:fonts && npm run fa-icons:compile && npm run fa-icons:minify
scripts.fa-icons:compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/fso-font-awesome.scss dist/fso-font-awesome.css
scripts.ua-icons:all: npm run ua-icons:compile && npm run ua-icons:minify
scripts.ua-icons:compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ua-brand-icons.scss dist/ua-brand-icons.css

author: Taylor, Riley Hal
